participant_2.background:
My art has helped me cope with the loss of my parents.
I'm doing my best to stay positive and make the most of my time in school, but I miss being a kid sometimes.
my mom is a nurse.
and , my best friend is abigail.
one day i played the lottery.

content.text: Hi there, how is your day going?
Hello! It's going well. How are you doing today?
Doing well, thank you. I'm from Grand Rapids, Michigan. Where are you from?
I'm from the Chicago area. I'm currently in school, but I miss being a kid sometimes.
I know how you feel, I miss being a kid too! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to draw and paint. Art has helped me cope with the loss of my parents.
Oh wow, I'm so sorry to hear about your loss. Art is a great way to express yourself. What kind of things do you like to draw and paint?
I like to draw portraits and landscapes. I also like to paint abstract pieces.
Wow, that sounds really cool. I'm not very artistic myself, but I appreciate it.
Thanks! Do you have any hobbies?
I like to play video games, watch sports, and go out to eat.
Sounds like we have a few things in common. I also like to watch sports and go out to eat.
What's your favorite sport to watch?
I like to watch basketball and football. I'm also a big fan of the Chicago Cubs.
I'm a fan of the Chicago Bears, so we can both root for them this season.
